thread.title: SABMiller Targets More Cost Savings in Takeover Defense
thread.title_full: SABMiller Targets More Cost Savings in Takeover Defense

title: SABMiller Targets More Cost Savings in Takeover Defense
text:
Published By: NYTimes Business - Today 
The brewer of Miller Lite and Peroni aims to convince investors it should stay independent, as it fends off bids from Anheuser-Busch InBev....
